name: Giant, Thursir Hearth Priestess
description: A large giant with magical capabilities that enhances allies and delivers strong melee attacks.
memorable: Possesses magic resistance and the ability to support allies through unique spells and abilities.
goals: To support allies in battle while delivering powerful attacks.
relations: May work closely with other giants or entities aligned to lawful evil powers.
environment: Often found in mountainous or heavily fortified areas.
strengths: High hit points and magical resistance provide excellent survivability.
weaknesses: Reliance on spellcasting and coordination with allies can be exploited.
attacks: Utilizes a magical Runic Staff for bludgeoning and fire damage, along with supportive spells.
most_powerful_ability: Hearth Blessing can significantly empower allies with various effects.
senses: Possesses a passive Perception of 13, indicating she is aware of her surroundings.
skills: Proficient in Wisdom saves, allowing her to resist effects that target Wisdom.
additional_information: Magic attacks can bypass resistance from non-magical creatures.
The Protect the Hearth ability allows allies to quickly reposition.
Can cast supportive spells multiple times a day, enhancing the party's effectiveness.
High Constitution grants good defense against physical ailments.
Offers various empowerment options, tailoring support to allies' needs.
spellcasting: Can cast spells like Cure Wounds, Heat Metal, and Haste to support allies.
test_queries: giant that supports allies with spells
lawful evil giant healer on the battlefield
large giant with magical weapon attacks
